Generate counts of beddays per month for an episode with an admission and discharge date

Source: R/create_monthly_beddays.R
create_monthly_beddays.Rd

Generate counts of beddays per month for an episode with an admission and discharge date

create_monthly_beddays(
  data,
  year,
  admission_date,
  discharge_date,
  include_costs = FALSE,
  count_last = TRUE
)

Arguments

data

Data to calculate beddays for.

year

The financial year in '1718' format.

admission_date

The admission/start date variable.

discharge_date

The admission/start date variable

include_costs

(default FALSE) - Select true for calculating monthly costs

count_last

(default TRUE) - Should the last day be counted, instead of the first?

Value

The data with additional variables apr_beddays to mar_beddaysthat count the beddays which occurred in the month.

Contents

Developed by Public Health Scotland, Jennifer Thom, James McMahon, Catherine Holland.
